Tests and QA Programs

Several test and quality assurance programs are provided with the SPMIDI SDK. These can be used to execute the Test Plan provided by Mobileer.

Contents of Quality Assurance Package

  • Test Plan
  • 'C' Tests
  • SMF File Tests
  • XMF File Tests (Valid files that contain SMF and DLS content).
  • Bad XMF File Tests (Corrupt files for testing error recovery.)
